"My message to Suffolk County as we recover from this summer’s extreme weather is simple: Your state is here for you. And we’re not going anywhere until the job is done."

- Governor Kathy Hochul @GovKathyHochul
Governor Kathy Hochul @GovKathyHochul

My message to Suffolk County as we recover from this summer’s extreme weather is simple: Your state is here for you. And we’re not going anywhere until the job is done.
